Verses: 1  parisuththavaangalukkaaga Serkkappadum Dharmappanaththaikkuriththu Naan Kalaaththiyaa Naattu Sabaigalukkup Pannina Thittaththinpadiye Neengalum Seyyungal.
2  naan Vandhirukkumpodhu Pananjerkkudhal Iraadhapadikku, Ungalil Avanavan Vaaraththin Mudhalnaaldhorum, Thanthan Varavukkuth Thakkadhaaga Edhaiyaagilum Thannidaththile Serththuvaikkakkadavan.
3  naan Varumpodhu Ungal Ubagaaraththai Erusalemukkuk Kondupogumpadikku, Neengal Thagudhiyullavargalaagak Kurikkiravargal Evargalo, Avargalidaththil Nirupangalaik Koduththu, Avargalai Anuppuven.
4  naanum Pogaththakkadhaanaal, Avargal Ennudanekooda Varalaam.
5  naan Makkedhoniyaa Naattin Vazhiyaaip Pogirapadiyaal, Makkedhoniyaa Naattaik Kadandhapinbu Ungalidaththirku Varuven.
6  naan Enge Ponaalum Neengal Ennai Vazhivittanuppumpadikku Naan Ungalidaththil Silakaalam Thangavendiyadhaayirukkum; Oruvelai Mazhaikaalam Mudiyumvaraiyum Iruppen.
7  ippozhudhu Vazhippirayaanaththile Ungalaik Kandukollamaatten; Karththaruththaravukoduththaal Ungalidaththil Vandhu Silakaalam Thangiyirukkalaamendru Nambugiren.
8  aanaalum Pendhekosthe Pandigaivaraikkum Ebesu Pattanaththil Iruppen.
9  enenil Inge Peridhum Anukoolamumaana Kadhavu Enakkuth Thirakkappattirukkiradhu: Virodhancheygiravargalum Anegar Irukkiraargal.
10  theemoththeyu Ungalidaththirku Vandhaaneyaagil, Avan Ungalidaththil Bayamillaamalirukkap Paarungal; Ennaippola Avanum Karththarudaiya Kiriyaiyai Nadappikkiraane.

11  aanapadiyinaal Oruvanum Avanai Arpamaai Ennaadhiruppaanaaga; Sagodhararodekooda Avan Varugiradharku Naan Kaaththirukkirapadiyaal, Ennidaththil Varumpadikku Avanai Samaadhaanaththode Vazhivittanuppungal.

12  sagodharanaagiya Appollovaikkuriththovenil, Sagodhararodekooda Ungalidaththil Varumpadikku Avanai Migavum Vendikkonden; Aagilum Ippozhudhu Vara Avanukku Manadhillai; Avanukku Narsamayam Undaayirukkumpodhu Varuvaan.
13  vizhiththirungal, Visuvaasaththile Nilaiththirungal, Purusharaayirungal, Thidankollungal.
14  ungal Kaariyangalellaam Anpode Seyyappadakkadavadhu.
15  sagodharare, Sthevaanudaiya Veettaar Agaayaanaattile Mudharbalanaanavargalendrum, Parisuththavaangalukku Oozhiyanjeyyumpadikkuth Thangalai Oppuviththirukkiraargalendrum Arindhirukkireergale.
16  ippadippattavargalukkum, Udanvelaiyaatkalaaip Pirayaasappadugira Matra Yaavarukkum Neengal Keezhppadindhirukkavendumendru Ungalukkup Puththisollugiren.
17  sthevaan, Porththunaaththu, Agaayukku Enbavargal Vandhadharkaaga Santhoshamaayirukkiren, Neengal Enakku Seyyavendiyadhaayirundhadhai Avargal Seydhirukkiraargal.
18  avargal En Aavikkum Ungal Aavikkum Aarudhal Seydhaargal; Ippadippattavargalai Angikaarampannungal.
19  aasiyaa Naattilulla Sabaiyaar Ungalai Vaazhththugiraargal. Aakkillaavum Piriskillaalum Thangal Veettile Koodugira Sabaiyodungoodak Karththarukkul Ungalai Migavum Vaazhththugiraargal.
20  sagodhararellaarum Ungalai Vaazhththugiraargal. Oruvaraiyoruvar Parisuththa Muththaththode Vaazhththungal.
21  pavulaagiya Naan En Kaiyezhuththaale Ungalai Vaazhththugiren.
22  oruvan Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvinidaththil Anbukooraamarponaal, Avan Sabikkappattavanaayirukkakkadavan, Karththar Varugiraar.
23  karththaraagiya Yesukirisdhuvinudaiya Kirubai Ungaludanekooda Iruppadhaaga.
24  kiristhu Yesuvukkullaana Ennudaiya Anbu Ungalellaarodunkooda Iruppadhaaga. Aamen.
